attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVERRRR!! It makes my phone soooo slow and it glitches!

When I first opened the app I was so excited to see my favorite man and his beautiful orange face🧡🧡🧡! Donny T! ✨🧚‍♀️My hero! As I opened the app I got a face time call from the White House! I was so surprised! Why were they calling me of all people🧐🤨?? But I answered the call and it was none other than Donny himself🤩🤩🤩! I didn’t know what to say! I just gasped and yelled! “I love you Mr President😘🥰😍💖💖💖!!!” Was all I could manage! But the president just started back at me with his cold unwavering eyes😨😰 Had I upset him?? My hero?!! The thought made my stomach do summer salts🤢 after a long awkward pause he said to me “I know what you did!!!😡😡😡” I was taken aback 😮 “Mr President what are you talking about😰?? What have I done to upset 😢😨you??” He laughed at me “HAH I know you are apart of that radical leftist communist group ANTIFA!! You have  no place in this country you terrorist!!!!!” I had no idea how I could redeem myself, this was not true! I had gone to one protest to stir up some trouble in the name of my hero (DONNY T) but I was no supporter of those terrorists!!! “Mr President that’s not true I-“ but he cut me off, there was no way I could prove myself to him😭😭😭 “Do NOT lie to me!!!!🤬🤬🤬you do not support this country you communist!!” I tried to interject but I could not! “ you have been banished from this country!🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸!!!” Then he hung up!😭😖😫😣😖😩😭😭😢😭 there was no place for me on this earth anymore. If my Donny does not love me then who will??? I walked over to my gun closet and grabbed on of my 15 AK-47 🔫🔫🔫and shot myself. I am writing this review from Heaven😇😇😇✝️✝️✝️ with Jesus himself!!! He has bestowed upon me with his wisdom and said that the love of my life Donald Trump will not be joining me in the kingdom of Heaven and will go and join satan in the depths of Hell🔥👹🔥because Milania is just a front and Pence and Trump are in a secret love affair👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨🌈🌈🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈!! I didn’t know what I was hearing but I knew that ✝️Jesus✝️ would not lie to me, I accepted the truth and looked down at my Donny from heaven. Knowing he would never join me. This made me very sad, why did I ever support someone like that?? I could not believe my self. the thought was unbearable. And so I spend the rest of my days alone in the kingdom of heaven, with Jesus✝️✝️✝️
